page.title: 09CLOVA SCHOOL CONCERT.
page.content: On Monday 25th June 1985. Clova School had a Concert in Clova hall. It started at 7:30pm. Our theme was Pinocchio. We had 2 dads helping to change the scenes. They were Mr. Edgar & Mr.Hubbert. Fiona Edgar, Primary two was Pinocchio; Dawn Hubbert, Primary one was Geppetto, a Pigeon & a widow; Claire Stephen, Primary three was a cat, builder & a cricket, and Jennifer Edgar, Primary six was a fox & a coalman. I, Jennifer, was the main narrator. There were 11 scenes & 8 songs in it altogether. About 90 people turned up. We had a Bring & Buy stall, a stall selling Christmas & Birthday cards and a refreshments stall. We made more than Â£112. Some people came from Cortachy, some from Kirriemuir but most came from the Glen. Mrs. Hubbert,our teacher,was presented with flowers at the close.
